headline: One Funeral at a Time
author: Z Man
sentences:
Primary campaigns are the most honest bit of politics as both parties are forced to publicly try to prevent the voters from picking a candidate
Comments:
Interesting analysis of the GOP candidates for Portman’s seat.
(Snip) Ohio’s centrality to the Dionysian theater that is American politics makes the 2022 Senate race worth watching.
(Snip)Only twice since the Second World War has Ohio failed to vote for the winner of the presidential election.
Since the middle of the last century, Ohio has been viewed as a bellwether for the mood of the American people.
Interestingly, those two outlier elections were marred by credible allegations of massive vote fraud.
Z Man has no interest in the two frontrunners, but looks with interest at #3, JD Vance.
Two-term liberal Republican Rob Portman is retiring.
This means there are two primaries this time.
